item.description:
Save the date for The Return of the Belgian Beer Fest! - Session Two, featuring authentic and Belgian-inspired beers.

Tickets onsale now! (Limited to 1,000 tickets.) $40 each.

Get tickets here: http://beeradvocate.c...

The Return of the Belgian Beer Fest on Saturday will feature a hand-picked selection of over 100+ authentic Belgian and inspired beers. Discover why we think Belgian ales are some of the most tasty and inspiring styles of beer on planet Earth!

Ticket price includes:

* Entry to the fest.
* All 2oz pours; Respect Beer.
* Tasting cup.
* Fest guide.
* Beer education.
item.name: Session Two: Belgian Beer Fest!
